name: .WLZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .WLZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Plugin file used by Winamp, a Windows music player; contains a collection of .LNG files for the language pack compressed in a .ZIP format; allows users to customize the interface to their own language.

content: Several language packs are available for download on the Winamp website.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
